title: [OCE] [LFT]  Gold 5 Looking for Ranked Team <3
body:
Looking for a ranked team ^^

IGN: Ealith
Rank: Gold 5
Role: Mid
Main Champion Pool (Limited it to 10, but can play most mid laners comfortably);
Ahri
Diana
LeBlanc
Annie
Ekko
Akali
Fizz
Lux
Katarina
Nidalee

Add me if you're interested. I'm pretty quiet so thats something I'll probably need to work on for communication purposes, but I'm always calm, patient and willing to listen/learn. 

Located in WA, if that means anything.

Thanks for the consideration <3
~Ealith

replies.body: Hey! I have a ranked team with 4 active members. Even though we're only in bronze 1, but we have been slowing climbing since bronze 4. Guess what? We are also in WA! We'd love a new active member. Add: BigBigDC if you're interested!
